code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  maxSumDivThree ( vector < int >&  nums )  {   vector < int >  dp ( 3 );    for  ( const  int  num  :  nums )   for  ( const  int  sum  :  vector < int > ( dp ))   dp [( sum  +  num )  %  3 ]  =  max ( dp [( sum  +  num )  %  3 ],  sum  +  num );   return  dp [ 0 ];   }  };
